page.title: 15CHURCHES IN ABERDOUR AREA
page.content: In our area there are{4}churches and one church hall.There is{St Fillans Church of Scotland,{St Columbas Episcopal Church and{St Teresa's (R.C.)Church in{Aberdour}and the{Barn {Fellowship}which meets in Old{Dalgety Church on the outskirts of{Dalgety {Bay. St Fillans Church of Scotland}has a congregation of{200}.The minister the{Rev.Scott}spends about{50}hours in the church weekly.They sometimes have services for children in the local primary school.{St.Columbas}has a congregation of only about{20}each Sunday and the minister is the{ {Rev Bowlzer.}At{St.Teresa's{150 {worshippers}attend each Sunday.Our school Minister is the{Rev.Elston} from{Dalgety Bay Parish Church}but this is not quite in our area.In a survey of{40}pupils in{pr.7, 17.5%}go to church regularly.
